item.title: The moon and the hare
item.summary: The moon said that men should die as it dies. The hare disagreed so the moon struck the hare and split its mouth.
item.comments: 1) p.24 opp: Piet Lynx heard this from his paternal grandfather who heard it from his Bushman head (?), 2) this story is found in Kora Book I-1
item.author: Piet Lynx
